lightly picked Warg up with ease,"},{"lineNumber":118005,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラッシーに無理矢理乗せた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and forcefully put her on Lassie."},{"lineNumber":118006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほーれほれ、これでワーグの本音が聞き放題だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here, here, now you can hear all of Warg's true feelings as much as you want.\""},{"lineNumber":118007,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、やめなさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, stop that!\""},{"lineNumber":118008,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ワーグ、俺のことをどう思っている？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Warg, what do you think of I love you.\""},{"lineNumber":118014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おほっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh ho.\""},{"lineNumber":118015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なあっ！　あぐっ！　ぐうっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey! Ugh! Guh!\""},{"lineNumber":118016,"originalJapaneseLine":"茹でタコのようにワーグの顔が真っ赤に染まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Warg's face flushed bright red, like a boiled octopus."},{"lineNumber":118017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だまっ、黙りなさい！　ラッシー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Be quiet, shut up! Lassie!\""},{"lineNumber":118018,"originalJapaneseLine":"「好かれてるだろうとは思ってたが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought I was liked,"},{"lineNumber":118019,"originalJapaneseLine":"　正直予想を遙かに上回っていたな」","translatedEnglishLine":"but honestly, it exceeded my expectations by far.\""},{"lineNumber":118020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、むふふ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, hehe."},{"lineNumber":118021,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こりゃ面白い」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is interesting.\""},{"lineNumber":118022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなに好きか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Do you like me that much?\""},{"lineNumber":118023,"originalJapaneseLine":"「好き！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I love you!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":118024,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーもう！　聞かないでー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, geez! Don't ask me!\""},{"lineNumber":118025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":118026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「黙りなさい、ラッシー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Be quiet, Lassie!"},{"lineNumber":118027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　黙って！　黙りなさい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Silence! Be quiet!\""},{"lineNumber":118028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やめっ！　やめてよ、ランス！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Stop! Stop it, Lance!"},{"lineNumber":118029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やめなさい、ね、お願いだから！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Stop, okay? Please!\""},{"lineNumber":118030,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーに、いいではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's the big deal? It's fine."},{"lineNumber":118031,"originalJapaneseLine":"　別にワーグが俺様大好きなことくらい","translatedEnglishLine":"I already knew that Warg loves me a lot."},{"lineNumber":118032,"originalJapaneseLine":"　前から知っとるわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've known it for a long time.\""},{"lineNumber":118033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ俺はハンサムだしな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I'm handsome after all.\""},{"lineNumber":118034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それは微妙」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That's debatable.\""},{"lineNumber":118035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだとー！　ワーグ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What?! Warg!\""},{"lineNumber":118036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょ、私が言ったんじゃないわよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, I didn't say that!\""},{"lineNumber":118037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、なんかワーグの秘密教えろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, tell me some secret of yours, Warg.\""},{"lineNumber":118038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当は……世界中のみんなと仲良くしたい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The truth is... I want to be friends with everyone in the world...\""},{"lineNumber":118039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私……素直じゃないから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm... not straightforward,"},{"lineNumber":118040,"originalJapaneseLine":"　難しいと思うけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so I think it's difficult...\""},{"lineNumber":118041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、結構ファンシーな願い事持ってるな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You have a pretty fancy wish...\""},{"lineNumber":118042,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":118043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっく……ぐすっ……うっ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hic... sniff... ugh... "},{"lineNumber":118044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　う〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Uhhhhhhhhhhhh...\""},{"lineNumber":118045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ！　マジ泣きしてる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa! She's really crying!\""},{"lineNumber":118046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、やめるやめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, I'll stop, I'll stop."},{"lineNumber":118047,"originalJapaneseLine":"　悪かったな、ワーグ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sorry about that, Warg."},{"lineNumber":118048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今、降ろす降ろす」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll put you down now.\""},{"lineNumber":118049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「降ろ、すな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't... put me down...\""},{"lineNumber":118050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会話してるように見せていた……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was made to look like we were having a conversation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 要はただの人形遊びね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Basically, it was just playing with dolls."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、ワーグっぽい言葉で喋っていたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Then, all the words that sounded like Warg,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜーんぶワーグの本心？」
ついっと、ワーグが視線を逸らした。
「……まあ、そういうことになるわね」
「えーと……
今までにどんなこと言ってたかな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of things have I said until now...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「思い出すのはやめなさい」
「うおっ、怖っ……睨むんじゃない……」
「ならいい、今、直接聞く」
ランスがワーグの軽い体をひょいと持ち上げ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance lightly picked Warg up with ease,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラッシーに無理矢理乗せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and forcefully put her on Lassie.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほーれほれ、これでワーグの本音が聞き放題だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Here, here, now you can hear all of Warg's true feelings as much as you want."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、やめなさい！」
「ワーグ、俺のことをどう思っている？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Warg, what do you think of me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当の気持ちを聞かせてみろ」
「へっ、本当の気持ち、なんて、そんな……」
「好き好き好きだーい好き。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I like you, like you, like you—I love you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大好き大好き、すっごく好き。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I really really love you, I like you a lot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ずーっと一緒にいたい。大好き」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to be with you forever. I love you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おほっ」
「なあっ！　あぐっ！　ぐうっ！」
茹でタコのようにワーグの顔が真っ赤に染まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Warg's face flushed bright red, like a boiled octopus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だまっ、黙りなさい！　ラッシー！」
「好かれてるだろうとは思ってたが、
正直予想を遙かに上回っていたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but honestly, it exceeded my expectations by far."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、むふふ。
こりゃ面白い」
「そんなに好きか？」
「あーもう！　聞かないでー！」
「がはははははははは！」
「黙りなさい、ラッシー！
黙って！　黙りなさい！」
「やめっ！　やめてよ、ランス！
やめなさい、ね、お願いだから！」
「なーに、いいではないか。
別にワーグが俺様大好きなことくらい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I already knew that Warg loves me a lot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前から知っとるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've known it for a long time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ俺はハンサムだしな」
「……それは微妙」
「なんだとー！　ワーグ！」
「ちょ、私が言ったんじゃないわよ！」
「よし、なんかワーグの秘密教えろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, tell me some secret of yours, Warg."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当は……世界中のみんなと仲良くしたい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The truth is... I want to be friends with everyone in the world..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私……素直じゃないから、
難しいと思うけど……」
「お前、結構ファンシーな願い事持ってるな……」
「あん？」
「ひっく……ぐすっ……うっ……
「うおっ！　マジ泣きしてる！」
「あー、やめるやめる。
悪かったな、ワーグ。
今、降ろす降ろす」
「降ろ、すな……」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
